10e1b912-2422-498f-8a33-3fe3d8438c6c.description: Earners of the Learning Online 2020 badge have the skills needed for effective online learning, instruction, and communication. They know and have demonstrated the computer literacy skills needed for an online course. These candidates are able to promote a seamless transition from face-to-face to a blended/hybrid learning environment.
10e1b912-2422-498f-8a33-3fe3d8438c6c.name: Learning Online

issuer.summary: issued by Bahamas Technical and Vocational Institute

badge_template_activities.title: Earners have successfully achieved a pass rate of 70% or above in an online quiz demonstrationg their skills and knowledge in the use of the learning management platform in relation.

Earners have successfully achieved a pass rate of 70% or above in terms of their ability to work with videoconferencing software and completion of assignments located on the learning management platform.

378015c7-3145-42e6-b01c-f7e19e3935b0.description: Earners of this badge have completed a 4 week course where they have demonstrated the ability to create and format a course. They have developed the fundamentals needed to instruct on an online/blended platform.
378015c7-3145-42e6-b01c-f7e19e3935b0.name: Teaching Online

badge_template_activities.title: Earners have demonstrated the development of their course spaces, in accordance with the rubric used to determine course readiness; best practices and implementation of interactive tools, gradebook setup, student enrollment, course formatting.

954fbf37-9155-4dbb-a447-7c11ccd1ab1b.description: Participants of this course have developed the skills required to create and effectively implement interactive course content for an online learning platform.

e7d21b1b-b1a9-4772-b56c-3ea3849983c8.description: The recipient of the Presentation badge has a fundamental understanding of the PowerPoint environment as well as creating and enhancing slides in an education setting or in the workplace independently. This candidate can demonstrate how to use objects, make up the content utilize in a slideshow presentation, as well as add and edit text, images, shapes, diagrams, graphs, and charts.

e73fa8a8-68db-48c9-a60f-74dcd5e45e06.description: The Recipient of the Word Processing badge has independently covered the use of core word processing features using the Word Processing software. The candidate can demonstrate using the correct features in the Word environment which include formatting documents, creating, editing, and formatting tables, using templates and performing modifications to provide professional-looking documents.

a4c3120a-61f7-4f3d-8428-49636210b304.description: The Recipient of the Internet of Things (IoT) badge has learned how the Internet of Things is changing the world and the skills needed to get a well-paying job. The candidate can demonstrate the use of Packet Tracer in the networking environment of physical objects, devices, vehicles, buildings, and other items, embedded with electronics, software, sensors, and network connectivity, which enables these objects to collect, analyze and exchange data.
a4c3120a-61f7-4f3d-8428-49636210b304.name: Internet of Things

issuer.summary: issued by Bahamas Technical and Vocational Institute

badge_template_activities.title: The recipient has successfully scored a passing score of 70% or above on the final examination.

The recipient has successfully completed assignments, a project, and quizzes with a passing score of 70% or above in terms of the ability to work with the packet tracer, a networking tool, and the impact of the digital transformations on today's society.

skills.name: Apply Best Practices for Implementing & Driving Digital Transformation

b3904d94-7a1d-4375-a993-74a679e3cdfe.description: Earners of the Entrepreneurship 2020 badge have obtained and demonstrated the hard and soft skills needed to start a small business. These candidates have gained an understanding of the market and are able to create their own business opportunities and define a comprehensive plan of action for their future as a self-employed individual.
b3904d94-7a1d-4375-a993-74a679e3cdfe.name: Entrepreneurship

issuer.summary: issued by Bahamas Technical and Vocational Institute

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have gained the fundamental skills required of an entrepreneur and developed the strategies and business plan needed to successfully start their own business.

6b62c39c-14d3-4385-b506-25b9591a09a1.description: Earners of the HTML, CSS and JavaScript badge have a fundamental understanding of HTML, CSS and JavaScript and the ability to complete tasks independently. They know and demonstrated sufficient coding skills to create simple webpages and style them accordingly. These candidate are able to add a basic level of interactive to their pages using JavaScript in a variety of purposes and situations.
6b62c39c-14d3-4385-b506-25b9591a09a1.name: HTML, CSS & JavaScript

issuer.summary: issued by Bahamas Technical and Vocational Institute

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge have achieved the skill level required to write accurate standards-compliant HTML to create basic webpages containing textual, visual and tabular data.
Earners of this badge have gained sufficient knowledge in coding CSS to style HTML documents with a range of enhancements such as colours, borders and other visual elements.
Earners of this badge have gained adequate skills in using CSS Frameworks to create webpages that are responsive to viewport sizes such as cellphones, tablets and desktop computers.
Earners of this badge have adequately integrated the use of JavaScript to add interactivity to their pages and improve accessibility.

c9444145-c72e-490c-832f-0f208d8c8cf2.description: Earners of the Introduction To Python badge have a fundamental understanding of Python programming and the ability to complete programming tasks independently. They demonstrate adequate use of the fundamentals of programming with Python. These candidates are able to code simple scripts using existing functions and methods for a variety of purposes and situations.
c9444145-c72e-490c-832f-0f208d8c8cf2.name: Introduction to Python

issuer.summary: issued by Bahamas Technical and Vocational Institute

02538f6b-9dc6-41e8-a4b9-5c4346efce33.description: Earners of the Introduction to Computers badge have a fundamental understanding of basic computer literacy and computer concepts. They have gained an understanding and demonstrated the correct use of applications, computer hardware and functions, installation of software applications and managing files and documents. These candidates are able to troubleshoot basic computer issues and work around common Microsoft Office features.
02538f6b-9dc6-41e8-a4b9-5c4346efce33.name: Introduction to Computers
